data.title: Tigmanshu Dhulia Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Tigmanshu Dhulia with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Was the lead singer of an English music band called Paranoids while in college

After completing studies at National School of Drama, worked as the chief assistant for Pradip Kishen's Electric Moon (1992)

Worked with Ketan Mehta as assistant art director for the movie Sardar Patel (1993)

Also worked as the casting director and assistant for Shekhar Kapur's Bandit Queen (1995)

Wrote dialogue for Mani Ratnam's Dil Se

(1998)

Made his directorial debut with the film Haasil (2003)

Launched his own production company Tigmanshu Dhulia Films Private Limited in 2013

Received National Film Best Feature Award and Filmfare Best Screenplay Award for Paan Singh Tomar (2013); also bagged the Best Director Award at the SAARC Film Festival for the movie

Awards

2013International Indian Film Academy Awards-Best Direction: nominated

2013International Indian Film Academy Awards-Best Story: nominated

2013Filmfare Awards-Best Screenplay: winner

2013Stardust Awards-Best Director - Searchlight Awards: nominated

2013Screen Awards-Best Director: nominated

2012Stardust Awards-Best Director - Searchlight Awards: winner

2012National Film Awards-Best Feature Film: winner

2004Zee Cine Awards-Best Story: nominated
